title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.5 - Classification of scholarships in medicine, dentistry, optometry and veterinary medicine
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.5 - Classification of scholarships in medicine, dentistry, optometry and veterinary medicine

State Regulations
(a) Regents scholarships in medicine and dentistry authorized under subdivision 3
of section
605
of the

Education Law shall be distributed on the basis of 20 for the professional
study of dentistry and the remainder for the professional study of medicine. Half of the dental scholarships shall be distributed to successful candidates
residing in the counties of the City of New York and half to successful
candidates residing in other counties of the State. Of the medical scholarships
not awarded pursuant to subdivision 4 of section
605
of the

Education Law, half shall be distributed to successful candidates residing in
the counties of the City of New York and half to successful candidates residing
in other counties of the State. Professional education in medicine shall
include the study of osteopathy. (b) The five Regents scholarships in
optometry authorized under subdivision 3-a of section
605
of the

Education Law shall be distributed on a statewide basis. (c) The 10 Regents scholarships in veterinary
medicine authorized under subdivision 3-b of section
605
of the

Education Law shall be distributed on a statewide basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
145-1.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
